tool_description: An API that gets you the real-time stock price of any NASDAQ-listed stock, along with some other parameters.
name: RealStonks
title: RealStonks

api_list.name: Stock Information
api_list.description: This endpoint gets you the real-time stock information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realstonks.p.rapidapi.com/TSLA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realstonks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://realstonks.p.rapidapi.com/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realstonks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
